description: This chicken curry is simple and full of flavour, making it the perfect midweek meal.
keywords: Yellow curry,Fakeaway,High fibre,High protein,Gluten free,Winter,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken,Budget
name: Easy Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 skinless chicken thigh fillets (cut into 4 pieces each)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep casserole saucepan over medium-high heat. Add onion and curry paste and cook for 2 minutes. Add chicken and cook, stirring, for 6 minutes or until browned.
Add coconut milk and 1 cup of water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and cover and simmer for 25 minutes. Divide among serving bowls and serve.
